All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
BusinessCommand
A representation of a business command that contains an ExagonCommand and other additional information, as stepIdentifiers and qualifiers.
BusinessStatus
A representation of a command execution result and its current step identifier.
DiameterStackConfiguration
 
ExagonCommand
An annotation used to mark objects as Exagon commands that are exchanged between microservices in a Saga.
ExagonCommandHandler
An annotation to register a method that waits for the availability of subscribed events, as Exagon commands and Exagon notifications, to start processing.
ExagonCommandQualifier
Enumeration of the command qualifiers supported by Exagon.
ExagonController
An annotation to identify classes with ExagonCommandHandler methods for processing subscribed events, as Exagon commands and Exagon notifications.
ExagonNotification
An annotation used to mark objects as Exagon notifications that are exchanged between microservices in a Saga.
ExagonProtocolMapper
An annotation to identify classes with ExagonCommandHandler methods for processing subscribed events, as Exagon commands and Exagon notifications.
ExagonStackConfiguration
An abstract configuration that represents a server and its channels, i.e., the mechanisms created by the server for the organization and transmission of messages (topics, peers, paths, depending on the protocol used).
HTTPStackConfiguration
 
HTTPStackConfiguration.Endpoints
 
IExagon
A specification of the Exagon core module used in a microservice startup phase to set up and startup Exagon.
IExagonCommandReply
A specification of a command result that also contains a network reply.
IExagonCommandResult
A specification of a command result.
IExagonExternalServer
A representation of an external server to which internal requests can be sent and replies received.
IExagonProtocolMapper
A specification for classes that represent an Exagon protocol mapper in the system.
IExagonWorkFlow
A specification of an Exagon workflow that contains the logic of a Saga flow.
KafkaStackConfiguration
 
LDAPStackConfiguration
 
LDAPStackConfiguration.LDAPServer
 
StackEvent
The Exagon's generic external representation of a network event (request or reply).
